scripts.console-api:convert: mkdir -p tmp && npx swagger2openapi tmp/console_swagger.json -o tmp/console_oapi3.json
scripts.console-api:split: rm -r tmp/split && mkdir -p tmp/split && openapi split tmp/console_oapi3.json --outDir tmp/split
scripts.console-api:integrate: mkdir -p openapi/paths/ && cp tmp/split/components/schemas/*.yaml openapi/components/schemas/ && cp tmp/split/paths/*.yaml openapi/paths/
scripts.console:generate-spec: yarn console-api:pull && yarn console-api:convert && yarn console-api:fix-external-schema-refs && yarn console-api:split && yarn console-api:integrate && yarn docs:generate-without-examples
scripts.docs:bundle: yarn console:generate-spec && yarn docs:bundle-spec && yarn docs:generate-examples && yarn docs:generate && python3 scripts/css.py && python3 scripts/far.py && cp -r assets/* dist
